definition: a rink with a floor of ice for ice hockey or ice skating, put ice on or put on ice
details:
noun
- a rink with a floor of ice for ice hockey or ice skating
= example: a rink with a floor of ice for ice hockey or ice skating
= synonyms: ice rink
- an amphetamine derivative (trade name Methedrine) used in the form of a crystalline hydrochloride
= synonyms: crank
- a frozen dessert with fruit flavoring (especially one containing no milk)
= synonyms: frappe
- a flavored sugar topping used to coat and decorate cakes
= synonyms: icing
- the frozen part of a body of water
- diamonds
= example: diamonds
= synonyms: sparkler
- water frozen in the solid state
= example: water frozen in the solid state
= synonyms: water ice
verb
- put ice on or put on ice
- cause to become ice or icy
= example: cause to become ice or icy
- decorate with frosting
= synonyms: frost
